Player History

Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1985, off Mario Soto (CIN)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1985...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/20/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $3,300,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1986...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1987...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago on 4/11/1988 (Going to LAD: P Jeff Pico, P Mike Remlinger. Going to CHC: C Tony Pena)...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/18/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $1,540,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1992 to a minor league contract.
Released by Toronto on 7/26/1992...
